did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: New York State Congress of Industrial Organizations. Newspaper clippings, 1945-1949
did.origination:
Congress of Industrial Organizations (CIO);
New York State Congress of Industrial Organizations
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two scrapbooks containing newspaper clippings relating to the New York State CIO from 1945 to 1949

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two scrapbooks of newspaper clippings relating to the New York State CIO from 1945 to 1949.

The clippings are organized by topic. Topics include NYS CIO President Louis Hollander, strike support, New York State Board of Regents, creation of a state university, Cornell University's New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, NYS CIO general activities, politics, and the NYS CIO Political Action Committee. Clippings are from regional and national press, in English and Yiddish.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
